Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1600 AIRPORT FREEWAY,NO. 100, BEDFORD, Texas, 76022, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Legacy Housing Corp builds, sells and finances manufactured homes and tiny houses that are distributed through a network of independent retailers and company-owned stores and are sold directly to manufactured home communities. It also provide consumer financing for its products which are sold to end-users through both independent and company-owned retail locations, and it provides financing to manufactured housing community owners that buy its products for use in their housing communities.
